description: Doing a GET /servers/xxx returns two empty attributes that are not used: key_name and config_drive. They aren't part of the core v2 spec (http://docs.openstack.org/api/openstack-compute/2/content/List_Servers-d1e2078.html)
title: GET /servers/xxx returns attributes which are not part of core v2 spec

comments.content: Doing a GET /servers/xxx returns two empty attributes that are not used: key_name and config_drive. They aren't part of the core v2 spec (http://docs.openstack.org/api/openstack-compute/2/content/List_Servers-d1e2078.html)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~iccha-sethi
